name: Quarter Circle Forward PUNCH!
description:
A STS mod, inspired by SF2's main characters (also other fighting games). 
 
Currently it adds 32 relics (two need The Artist Mod), 12 custom game modifiers, 1 event and 1 potion, all in English and simplified Chinese. 
 
Most of the images in this mod are temporary and will be substituted/improved on v1.0.
credits:
Current translations: English (Levender) 
 Simplified Chinese (Rita Bernstein) 
 
Original creators of original CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) images that 
were then modified by myself for the mod: 
 
Lorc (http://lorcblog.blogspot.com/) - Basis of many boots, Duffel Bag, Fighting Gloves, Handcuffs, Killian Engine Alpha, White Boots and Handcuffs. 
Delapouite (http://delapouite.com/) - Basis of Cattail, Dark Gi, Mixed Paint Bucket, Red Gi, Red Headband, School Backpack and Wrestler's Cloak.
 sbed (https://opengameart.org/users/sbed) - Basis of Necklace of Skulls. 
 
All images above came from http://game-icons.net.
 
oninego (instagram.com/oninego) - Original graphics for Black Training Shirt, Chain With Nametags and Special Ops Insignia.  
 
Big thanks for all who helped with testing, suggestions, ideas and criticism! 
More detailed thanks at https://github.com/Clauvin/Quarter_Circle_Forward_PUNCH_Mod 
 
Street Fighter is an IP from Capcom, all rights reserved for it and its SFX.
